text: fqlna: adrbu alqatil bjz' min hadhih albqrt almdhbwht, fa'iina allah sybethh hyana, wykhbrkm ean qatlh. fdrbwh bibaediha fahyah allah wakhbr bqatlh. kdhlk yuhyy allah almawtaa yawm alqyamt, wyrykm- ya bunaya 'israyyl- mejzath aldalt ealaa kamal qudratih teala; likay tatafakaruu beqwlkm, ftmtneu ean measyh
